content: from * around join 30 sts round 5 chain 1 single_crochet around join round 6 chain 1 *bbl single_crochet 2 repeat from * around join round 7 chain 1 single_crochet around join round 8 chain 1 *single_crochet 2 bbl repeat from * around join round 9 chain 1 single_crochet around join rnds 10-13 repeat rnds 6-9 round 14 chain 1 *bbl decrease bbl single_crochet repeat from * around join 24 sts round 15 chain 1 *single_crochet 2 decrease repeat from 8 around join 18 sts begin stuffing round 16 chain 1 *single_crochet decrease repeat from * around join 12 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing finish stuffing tail finishing sew wool cap to smaller end of head attach head to neck the neck is slightly tilted to allow for a good angle on the head make sure the neck is firmly stuffed so the head doesn t flop around disclaimer the character of shaun the sheep is not owned by me but this pattern is © abigail gonzalez chanteuse crochet all rights reserved this pattern may not be sold or otherwise distributed or altered 6 sew pupils to the middle of the eye whites sew onto head right by the hair line since shaun has sort of buggy eyes you can add a small amount of stuffing behind the whites as you sew them to the head fold the small end of the ears in half and run a few sts through to secure the fold sew to the sides of the head sew the arms/legs to the sides and bottom of the body attach the tail in the back centered between the legs i hope you enjoyed this pattern feel free to share finished projects on my facebook page where you can see progress pics of my current wips
